subtitle: Aroon Up/Down — time since recent highs/lows to gauge trend changes.

measures.how_to_read: Aroon Up near 100% and Aroon Down low suggests uptrend; inverse suggests downtrend.
measures.caveats: Can lag and whipsaw; use with trend filters.

assistant_hints: Look for strong up/down divergence after consolidation.
Confirm with price/EMA to avoid whipsaws.
Use as context for trend onset, not precise entries.
Longer windows reduce noise but delay signals.
